title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 7-3.9 - Payments of installments in advance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 7-3.9 - Payments of installments in advance

State Regulations
(Tax Law, section 213-b(j))

At the election of the taxpayer, any installment of the
estimated tax may be paid prior to the date prescribed for its payment. No
interest will be allowed or paid on such prepayment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§§
7-3.9

Adopted

New

York State Register December 27, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 52, eff. 12/27/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
